title:  footer-4col-1
author: kelly@nexuspoint.co.uk
    
#   Full width element with it's own .sw internal wrapper

#   Useage


```

<footer-4col_1>
	<template slot="content-1">
		<h1>Footer-widget-customhtml</h1>

		<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
		tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam,
		quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo
		consequat.</p>

		<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
		tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
	</template>

	<template slot="content-2">
		<h1>Popular vehicles</h1>

		<widget-vehicle-popular />
	</template>

	<template slot="content-3">
		<h1>Social links</h1>

		<widget-social>
			<template slot="links">
				<a class="facebook" href="#" title="facebook"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Facebook</span></a>
		        <a class="twitter" href="#" title="Twitter"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Twitter</span></a>
		        <a class="google" href="#" title="Google Plus"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Google Plus</span></a>
		        <a class="pinterest" href="#" title="Pinterest"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Pinterest</span></a>
		        <a class="instagram" href="#" title="Instagram"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Instagram</span></a>
		        <a class="youtube" href="#" title="YouTube"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on YouTube</span></a>
		        <a class="vimeo" href="#" title="Vimeo"><span class="accessible" aria-hidden="true">Share on Vimeo</span></a>
			</template>
		</widget-social>
	</template>

	<template slot="content-4">
		<h1>Latest blog posts</h1>

		<widget-bloglatest-thumbs />
	</template>
</footer-4col_1>

```
